SS fired 8 lasers at Perceptor.

OOC: I saw the movie and Perceptor was a good guy.  Explaination 
please?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Tyrael sent a massive bolt of light straight at Perceptor. The 
battle 
> was tight and he knew they'd have to pull out before long. Shadow 
Star 
> seemed battle-worn and it was obvious he needed some repairs.
> 
> Tyrael: Come and get this, Predafreaks!
> 
> Burrock lanced out with his tentacles, trying to reach for 
Waspinator 
> or Quickstrike.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Perceptor::
> > 
> > 
> > Perceptor roared 'cause he couldn't see where SS was.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > SS dug out of the hole, sending up another smoke-screen to 
avoid 
> > > Perceptors fire, and managed to transform and jog at a fair 
pace 
> to 
> > > Tyreal
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > The techno-organic fabric of the two Tripredacus had 
seemingly 
> > > drove 
> > > > them in a foggy unconscious state. As a result, they were hit 
by 
> > > all 
> > > > the shots that came at them. This broke their reverie.
> > > > 
> > > > Tyrael stood up and looked around. He took flight and tried 
to 
> > > grasp 
> > > > the situation. The predacon goons seemed to be falling back, 
but 
> > he 
> > > > could only see Burrock and Shadow Star, whereas Talon was 
> nowhere 
> > > to 
> > > > be seen.
> > > > 
> > > > Tyrael: TRIPREDACUS! REGROUP! WE WILL PUSH THEM BACK FURTHER 
IF 
> > WE 
> > > > CONCENTRATE FIRE!
> > > > 
> > > > Burrock went to where Shadow Star was and smiled. He didn't 
know 
> > > who 
> > > > he was shooting at, but he shot acidic spikes.
> > > > 
> > > > Burrock: Hehe... I like this new order...
